abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie Diamond Tongues, starring Leah Goldstein.

headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Diamond Tongues,’ Leah Goldstein Plays a Flawed Actress
headline.main: Review: In ‘Diamond Tongues,’ Leah Goldstein Plays a Flawed Actress

snippet: Ms. Goldstein’s character is resentful and disarming as she tries to make it in show business in Toronto.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Goldstein’s character is resentful and disarming as she tries to make it in show business in Toronto.
